com.github.yona168.giraffe.net.messenger.server

Class GServer

  • AbstractScopedPacketChannelComponent
    • com.github.yona168.giraffe.net.messenger.server.GServer
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    CanProcessPackets, Server, Toggled

    public class GServer
extends AbstractScopedPacketChannelComponent
implements Server

    The given implementation for interface Server. This class uses a MutableMap to store client UUIDs to the interface Client objects, which represent server-side connections. CoroutineScope.coroutineContext is overriden with Dispatchers.IO+AbstractScopedPacketChannelComponent.getJob. After accepting a Client, it writes a handshake packet (see class GClient description), giving it a session UUID as referenced by Client.getSessionUUID. Any interface Client that uses this server should handle the packet accordingly, or ignore it.

    See Also:
    interface Server, MutableMap, UUID, interface Client, CoroutineScope.coroutineContext, Dispatchers.IO, AbstractScopedPacketChannelComponent.getJob, class GClient, Client.getSessionUUID, interface Client

    • Constructor Detail

      • GServer

        public GServer(java.net.SocketAddress address,
               PacketProcessor packetProcessor)

        The given implementation for interface Server. This class uses a MutableMap to store client UUIDs to the interface Client objects, which represent server-side connections. CoroutineScope.coroutineContext is overriden with Dispatchers.IO+AbstractScopedPacketChannelComponent.getJob. After accepting a Client, it writes a handshake packet (see class GClient description), giving it a session UUID as referenced by Client.getSessionUUID. Any interface Client that uses this server should handle the packet accordingly, or ignore it.

        Parameters:
        address - The SocketAddress to have the server run on
        packetProcessor - The interface PacketProcessor to process received packets with.
        address - The SocketAddress to have the server run on
        packetProcessor - The interface PacketProcessor to process received packets with.
        See Also:
        interface Server, MutableMap, UUID, interface Client, CoroutineScope.coroutineContext, Dispatchers.IO, AbstractScopedPacketChannelComponent.getJob, class GClient, Client.getSessionUUID, interface Client

      • getCoroutineContext

        public kotlin.coroutines.CoroutineContext getCoroutineContext()

        public boolean onConnect(java.util.function.Consumer<com.github.yona168.giraffe.net.messenger.client.Client> func)

        Registers a function to run with a connection once it connects.

        Parameters:
        func - the function to execute, passing the connected client connection as an argument.
        Returns:
        true if this process was successfully registered.
